publicationStmt.p: published electronically as part of the TLS project at https://hxwd.org

sourceDesc.p: Created by members of the TLS project

tls:line.title: 百喻經 (en)

tls:text.tls:line: you will be reborn in the Heavenly Realm

sense.def: first of the Three Realms 三界 (梵眾天，梵補天，大梵天)

tls:line.title: 百喻經 (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Then he assembled the instrument to inject the liquid

sense.def: marks a judgmental question sentence 何謂也What does this mean?

seg.line: 云何頃來而不造作如是之樓？」

tls:text.tls:srcline: 云何頃來而不造作如是之樓？」

sense.def: 如是之樓“a building like that": VP adjectivally modifying nominal head
may be properly compared to, be comparable to the case of (typically but not always with understood subject)
may be properly compared with S
A place were dramatic performances are held.

tls:line.title: 百喻經 (en)

tls:text.tls:line: If he had debt

sense.def: if (contrary to fact) GY: 若其予之 若其有知 "if they have awareness"

tls:line.title: 百喻經 (en)

tls:text.tls:line: then even if you got a thousand heads in return,

sense.def: even if, contrary to conceivable fact

tls:line.title: 百喻經 (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and misguidedly hope for worldly delightes.

sense.def: hope for; place one's hope and expectation in

tls:line.title: 百喻經 (en)

tls:text.tls:line: they have hope in their minds

tls:line.title: 百喻經 (en)

tls:text.tls:line: they have hope in their minds

tls:line.title: 百喻經 (en)

tls:text.tls:line: They asked: "Does the sublunar world>the world-as-we-know-it count as existing or as non-existing?"

sense.def: 天下之物 the sublunar world; all there is under Heaven; the sublunar world

tls:line.title: 百喻經 (en)

tls:text.tls:line: The monks are also like this:

tls:line.title: 百喻經 (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and indeed it turned out (to his mind) to be his own wife.

tls:line.title: 百喻經 (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Once upon a time there was a man

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: and in every way he practised generosity.

sense.def: BUDDH: giving, making offerings (to the Buddha or the monks/nuns); SANSKRIT dāna[pāramitā]

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: he was hoping for an ample sugary flavour,

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: The host offered him something to eat,

sense.def: in the company of the contextually determinate N

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: The host treated him to a meal ,

sense.def: host; master of ceremonies; pater familias

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: the host added some salt ***for his guest.

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: the host added some salt ***for his guest.

sense.def: add N1 to the contextually determinate N2

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: With the salt, the food tasting wonderful

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: With the salt, the food tasting wonderful

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: "The reason why it is wonderful

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: is all because of the salt.

sense.def: because of/ conditioned by S (therefore V)

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: is all because there was the salt.

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: how much more so with a still larger amount.

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: and contrary to his intentions the salt became his misfortune.

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: and contrary to his intentions the salt became his misfortune.

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: and contrary to his intentions the salt became his misfortune.

sense.def: 惡其賊 "hates his malefactors": npro is the object of the transitivity in Ntr

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: The fool stands for those dissenters:

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: They hear that by controlling what they drink and eat they can obtain the Buddhist Way

sense.def: learn that S, hear that S

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: Some survive for seven days,

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: Some survive for seven days,

sense.def: day, the length of a day counted as day-time; day on which something is to be done>date

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: others survive for fifteen days.

sense.def: day, the length of a day counted as day-time; day on which something is to be done>date

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: They are like that fool:

sense.def: 民如野鹿“The people are like wild deer": be like, look like, act like (what) 何如

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: They are like that fool:

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: They are like that fool:

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: Because of the good taste of salt he went ahead and ate nothing else.

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: Because of the good taste of salt he went ahead and ate nothing else.

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: Because of the good taste of salt he went ahead and ate nothing else.

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: Because of the good taste of salt he went ahead and ate nothing else.

sense.def: 以鹽美故 "because the salt was particulalry savoury"

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: He got to cause his mouth to feel uncomfortable,

sense.def: cause N to V, get (someone) to (do something);

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: He got to cause his mouth to feel uncomfortable,

sense.def: cause someone to go as far s to do something

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: He got to cause his mouth to feel uncomfortable,

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: and this is also like the case of the dissenters.

sense.def: anaphoric: this (particular aforementioned abstract but definite) item

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: 2. Once upon a time there was a fool

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: 2. Once upon a time there was a fool

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: who was about to lay on a feast,

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: On the occasion he had the following thought:

sense.def: this N (which will be identified below)

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: "If I now in preparation for this day every mid-day I milk the buffalo

sense.def: Now in the present case; now, in this instance

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: "If I now in preparation for this day every mid-day I milk the buffalo

sense.def: if; or if (often with implicit subject and without 則 in main clause, and note 若...是 as in 若晉常先，是楚弱也 which has many parallels. Apodosis often )

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: "If I now in preparation for this day every mid-day I milk the buffalo

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: "If I now in preparation for this day every mid-day I milk the buffalo。【𤚲(gòu)：挤动物乳汁。】

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: "If I now in preparation for this day every mid-day I milk the buffalo。【𤚲(gòu)：挤动物乳汁。】

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: "If I now in preparation for this day every mid-day I milk the buffalo。【𤚲(gòu)：挤动物乳汁。】

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: the buffalo milk will become more and more.

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: Then suddenly at some point in the end there will be nowhere to keep the milk,

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: It will be best to just leave it filling up the buffalo's belly.
